data.eml:eml: Two new species of Elaphoidella (Copepoda, Harpacticoida) from caves in southern Thailand and a key to the species of Southeast Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watiroyram, Santi, Sanoamuang, La-Orsri, Brancelj, Anton (2017): Two new species of Elaphoidella (Copepoda, Harpacticoida) from caves in southern Thailand and a key to the species of Southeast Asia. Zootaxa 4282 (3): 501-525, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.3.5
